package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==0||i==n-1||j==0||j==n-1||i-j==0||i+j==n-1) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==0||i==n-1||j==0||j==n-1||i-j==0) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

 * * * * * * * * *

 package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==0||i==n-1||j==0||j==n-1||i-j<=0) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

 * * * * * * * * *

 package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==0||i==n/2||i==n-1||j==0||j==n-1) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==0||j==n-1) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==n/2||i+j==(n-1)/2||j==n/2) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

	package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==n/2||i+j==(n-1)/2||j==n/2) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==0||i==n-1||j==n-1||i==n/2) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

 package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==n-1||j==n/2||i+j==(n-1)/2) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

 package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==n-1||j==n-1||i==0||j==0) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

 * * * * * * * * *

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==0||i==n-1||j==0||j==n-1||i-j==0||i+j==n-1||i==n/2||j==n/2||i+j==(n-1)/2||i-j==n/2) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

 * * * * * * * * *
 * *   * *     * *
 *   *   *   *   *
 * *   * * *     *

 *   *   *   *   *
 * *   * *     * *
 * * * * * * * * *

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i-j==0||j==0||i==n-1) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

 *                
 * *              
 *   *            
 *     *          
 *       *        
 *         *      
 *           *    
 *             *  
 * * * * * * * * *

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i==n/2||j==n/2||i+j==(n-1)/2||i-j==(-n/2)||i-j==n/2||i+j==(n-1)+n/2) {
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

         *        
       * * *      
     *   *   *    
   *     *     *  
 * * * * * * * * *
   *     *     *  
     *   *   *    
       * * *      
         *        

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(j==0||i==n-1||i==0||j==n-1) {					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(j==0||i==n-1||i==0||j==n-1) {					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

 * * * * * * * * *

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i-j==0||j==0||i==n-1||i==0||j==n-1||i+j==n-1) {					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}

 * * * * * * * * *
 * *           * *
 *   *       *   *
 *     *   *     *
 *       *       *
 *     *   *     *
 *   *       *   *
 * *           * *
 * * * * * * * * *

package patterns;

public class Patterns {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int n=9;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++) {
			for(int j=0;j<n;j++) {
				if(i+j<=n/2||i-j>=n/2||i-j<=(-n/2)||i+j>=(n-1)+n/2) {					
					System.out.print(" *");
					}
				else {
					System.out.print("  ");
				}
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}
}
